kit.leader_skill: "DB Saga", "Youth" or "Exploding Rage" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional Ki +1 and HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who also belong to the "Dragon Ball Seekers" or "Bond of Friendship" Category

super_attack.name: Goku's Charge! (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK and raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy; Unit Super Attack; Dragon Team Assemble! (Extreme); Massively raises ATK and; greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy; Greatly lowers ATK; Activation Conditions; Activated when there is an ally whose name; includes "Yamcha", "Master Roshi", "Oolong",; "Bulma (Youth)" or "Bulma (Bunny)"; attacking in the same turn; Unit Super Attack; Friendship Attack (Extreme); Massively raises ATK and; greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy; Greatly lowers ATK; Activation Conditions; Activated when there is an ally whose name; includes "Hacchan" (Berserk excluded); attacking in the same turn

passive_skill.name: Adventure Beyond Adventure
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 159% up; (Forever) "DB Saga", "Youth" or "Dragon Ball Seekers" Category allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 50% up; (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 159% up; For every Ki Sphere obtained: ATK & DEF 30% up; For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 10% up; 3 or more Ki Spheres obtained, or 1 or more Ki Spheres obtained as the 3rd attacker in a turn: DEF 159% up; 5 or more Ki Spheres obtained, or 3 or more Ki Spheres obtained as the 3rd attacker in a turn: Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; 7 or more Ki Spheres obtained, or 5 or more Ki Spheres obtained as the 3rd attacker in a turn: All allies' chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 8% up; All allies' ATK & DEF 8% up for 2 turns
